scripts.preinstall: node -e "if(process.version.split('v')[1].split('.')[0] < 18) { console.error('Node.js version 18 or higher is required. Current version: ' + process.version); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.check-node-version: node -e "if(process.version.split('v')[1].split('.')[0] < 18) { console.error('Node.js version 18 or higher is required. Current version: ' + process.version); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.build: npm run check-node-version && tsc && npm run test:pact:verify
scripts.test:api: npm run check-node-version && newman run postman_collection.json
scripts.test:api:setup: npm run dynamodb:start && npm run dynamodb:create-table && node scripts/insert-sample-data.js && npm run test:api
scripts.dynamodb:start: npm run check-node-version && docker run -d -p 8000:8000 --name dynamodb-local amazon/dynamodb-local || true
scripts.dev:with-dynamodb: npm run check-node-version && npm run dynamodb:start && npm run dynamodb:create-table && node scripts/insert-sample-data.js && npm run dev
scripts.pact:setup: npm run pact:create-environments && npm run pact:create-pacticipant
scripts.pact:create-environments: npx pact-broker create-environment --name=dev --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292 && npx pact-broker create-environment --name=uat --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292 && npx pact-broker create-environment --name=prod --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292
scripts.pact:verify:dev: npm run test:pact:verify && npx pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant=article-metadata-api --version=$npm_package_version --to-environment=dev --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292
scripts.pact:verify:uat: npm run test:pact:verify && npx pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant=article-metadata-api --version=$npm_package_version --to-environment=uat --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292
scripts.pact:verify:prod: npm run test:pact:verify && npx pact-broker can-i-deploy --pacticipant=article-metadata-api --version=$npm_package_version --to-environment=prod --broker-base-url=http://localhost:9292
scripts.pact:verify:all: npm run pact:verify:dev && npm run pact:verify:uat && npm run pact:verify:prod
scripts.pact:deploy:all: npm run pact:deploy:dev && npm run pact:deploy:uat && npm run pact:deploy:prod
scripts.pact:release:dev: npm run pact:version && npm run pact:verify:dev && npm run pact:deploy:dev
scripts.pact:release:uat: npm run pact:version && npm run pact:verify:uat && npm run pact:deploy:uat
scripts.pact:release:prod: npm run pact:version && npm run pact:verify:prod && npm run pact:deploy:prod
scripts.pact:release:all: npm run pact:version && npm run pact:verify:all && npm run pact:deploy:all
